abstract: Lawsuit filed by six female prisoners in New York State claims sexual harassment and abuse of female prisoners is widespread and that corrections officers openly disregard policies governing such behavior because Dept of Corrections and Community Supervision rarely disciplines officers.
lead_paragraph: The suit, replete with claims of forcible intercourse, harassment and voyeurism, seeks to end what it calls the “pattern of sexual misconduct” at the state’s all-female correctional facilities.

headline.main: Suit Alleges Persistent Sexual Abuse of Female Inmates in New York State Prisons
headline.print_headline: Female Inmates’ Suit Says Sex Abuse Is Persistent in State Prisons
